sub_2_2a_measure_description: Alcohol use brief intervention provided or offered
sub_3_3a_measure_description: Alcohol and other drug use disorder treatment provided or offered at discharge
tob_3_3a_measure_description: Tobacco use treatment provided or offered at discharge
tr_1_measure_description: Transition record with specified elements received by discharged patients (TR1)
faph_measure_description: Percent of patients receiving follow-up care within 30 days (FAPH-30) or within 7 days (FAPH-7) after psychiatric hospitalization
medcont_measure_description: Medication Continuation Following Inpatient Psychiatric Discharge
readm_30_ipf_measure_desc: Patients readmitted to any hospital within 30 days of discharge from the inpatient psychiatric facility (READM-30-IPF)
ipfqr_hcp_covid_19_measure_description: Percentage of healthcare personnel who are up to date with COVID-19 vaccinations (IPFQR-HCP-COVID-19)
